synopsis.text:
As the nefarious Kisaragi Corporation stands on the brink of global domination, its ambitions soar beyond Earth, targeting interstellar conquest. Enter Combat Agent Six, a self-proclaimed elite operative, and his android partner Alice, who are dispatched to an alien world to pave the way for the corporation's expansion. Upon arrival, Six's first order of business is to sabotage a sacred ritual with an embarrassing incantation, but this is only the beginning of his chaotic journey.

In this magical realm, Six encounters a female knight astride a unicorn, and stumbles upon the Demon Lord's Army, a rival evil faction vying for control of the planet. To secure his coveted promotion and salary bump, Six must navigate a complex web of evil deeds, unexpected alliances, and hilarious twists, all while ensuring that there's only room for one villainous organization on this world. Will Six and Alice rise to the challenge, or will the Demon Lord's Army thwart their plans for interstellar conquest? Join them on their outrageous adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
